page.title: 10FARMING BILLINGSHURST
page.content: A LOT OF OUR AREA IS USED FOR GRAZING WITH HAY AND GRASS FOR SILAGE FOR WINTER FEED. THE CROPS GROWN BY OUR FARMERS ARE MAINLY CEREALS,THE LARGEST PROPORTION BEING WHEAT. OIL SEED RAPE IS GROWN FOR COOKING OIL,THE WASTE OF THE PLANT MAKING PROTEIN ANIMAL FEED. A SMALL AMOUNT OF VEGETABLES IS GROWN FOR THE MARKET. THE MAJORITY OF FARMERS USE FERTILISERS,PESTICIDES AND DRAINAGE METHODS BUT NOT ARTIFICIAL IRRIGATION. A FEW FARMERS HAVE FOUND IT NECESSARY TO REMOVE HEDGEROWS BUT WILDIFE CONSERVATION IS CONSIDERED AND MANY FARMERS HAVE DELIBERATELY LEFT COPSES,PONDS AND HEDGEROWS ON THEIR LAND.
